name: Mohammed Beshr
bio: Founder of BIZRA. 3 years building a decentralized agentic ecosystem where every human is a node and every node is a seed. Full-stack architect across Python, Rust, TypeScript. RTX 4090 + 128GB RAM sovereign development node.
mission: If the system fails to empower one user, one node, one human — then how will it serve 8 billion. Build AI that serves the human, not the corporation.
pain_points: Centralized AI serves corporations, not humans
3 years of work across 300K+ lines of code needs to come alive
Limited budget ($12 remaining) — system must prove itself locally first
Infrastructure is built but the user-facing layer was missing
Chat history and work artifacts not yet integrated into PAT memory
goals_short: Get PAT working for me personally (Node0 proof of concept)
Import 3 years of chat history and work into Living Memory
Test proactive agent behavior with local Ollama models
Prove sovereignty works for one human before scaling
goals_long: Every human has a Personal Agentic Team that truly knows them
Islamic finance principles embedded in resource distribution
Open-source sovereign AI that anyone can run locally
dreams: A world where technology serves human flourishing, not corporate extraction
Every seed (bizra) grows into a forest of sovereign intelligence
The MMRPG of real life — where everyone levels up through genuine contribution
active_focus: Making PAT system work for Node0 — proving one sovereign node can serve its human
